vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.16;
son of: Machir (H4353) and Maacah (H4601M);
brother of: Gilead (H1568H), Sheresh (H8329) and Hammolecheth (H4447)
§ Peresh = "dung"
son of Machir by his wife Maachah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   contenido del estómago; (2)   hijo de Maquir; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
毗利施 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 意思不明確
瑪拿西人, 瑪吉和其妻瑪迦所生的兒子 (代上 7:16| )
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
毗利施 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 意思不明确
玛拿西人, 玛吉和其妻玛迦所生的儿子 (代上 7:16| )
